caption: Ruby returned to the volcano and once again tried to get the weapon. This time she did it, she successfully took out the trident and handed it to Chelsea. However, Chelsea suddenly burst out laughing and her appearance changed. In fact, she was the Mermaid Queen. The reason why she made friends with Ruby was just want to use her power to get the weapon. She trapped Ruby at the bottom of the sea and then swam back to the surface. At this moment, Ruby's mother and grandmother arrived and they fought against her. Due to the power of the weapon, the Queen Mermaid gradually gained the upper hand.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Is it a cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a cartoon movie.
